question: The Indian Space Research Organisation (ISRO) is to establish a Regional Academic Centre for Space (RAC-S) at which institution?
explanation:
The Indian Space Research Organisation (ISRO) is to establish a Regional Academic Centre for Space (RAC-S) at Indian Institute of Technology (BHU).
The Academic Centre would be set up to facilitate short- and long-term projects at the institute, to promote the culture of research and development among students. Capacity building programmes like conferences, exhibitions will also be organised.
